pli-tv-kd1:37.14.1: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:37.14.2: Āpattiṁ jānāti, anāpattiṁ jānāti, lahukaṁ āpattiṁ jānāti, garukaṁ āpattiṁ jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, dasavasso vā hoti atirekadasavasso vā—
pli-tv-kd1:37.14.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena yo so aññatitthiyapubbo upajjhāyena sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno upajjhāyassa vādaṁ āropetvā taṁyeva titthāyatanaṁ saṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.4: “Yo so, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo upajjhāyena sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno upajjhāyassa vādaṁ āropetvā taṁyeva titthāyatanaṁ saṅkanto, so āgato na upasampādetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.5: Yo so, bhikkhave, aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṁ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṁ, tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.2.2: paṭhamaṁ kesamassuṁ ohārāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā ‘evaṁ vadehī’ti vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.1: Tena, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbena saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.2: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.3: Sohaṁ, bhante, saṅghaṁ cattāro māse parivāsaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.8: Ayaṁ itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati upasampadaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.9: So saṅghaṁ cattāro māse parivāsaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.10: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ saṅgho itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsaṁ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.2: Ayaṁ itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati upasampadaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.3: So saṅghaṁ cattāro māse parivāsaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.4: Saṅgho itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsaṁ deti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.5: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsassa dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.7: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāso.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.8: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.5.1: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti, evaṁ anārādhako.
pli-tv-kd1:38.5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo atikālena gāmaṁ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.5.5: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo vesiyāgocaro vā hoti, vidhavāgocaro vā hoti, thullakumārikāgocaro vā hoti, paṇḍakagocaro vā hoti, bhikkhunigocaro vā hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.6.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni karaṇīyāni, tattha na dakkho hoti, na analaso, na tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato, na alaṁ kātuṁ, na alaṁ saṁvidhātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.6.3: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo na tibbacchando hoti uddese, paripucchāya, adhisīle, adhicitte, adhipaññāya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yassa titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa avaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho, buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.2: Yassa vā pana titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho, buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.4: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo anārādhako hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.5: Evaṁ anārādhako kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo āgato na upasampādetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo nātikālena gāmaṁ pavisati nātidivā paṭikkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.8.4: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo na vesiyāgocaro hoti, na vidhavāgocaro hoti, na thullakumārikāgocaro hoti, na paṇḍakagocaro hoti, na bhikkhunigocaro hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.9.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni karaṇīyāni, tattha dakkho hoti, analaso, tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato, alaṁ kātuṁ, alaṁ saṁvidhātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.9.3: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo tibbacchando hoti uddese, paripucchāya, adhisīle, adhicitte, adhipaññāya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yassa titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa avaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho, buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.2: Yassa vā pana titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho, buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.4: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.5: Evaṁ ārādhako kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo āgato upasampādetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.1: Sace, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo naggo āgacchati, upajjhāyamūlakaṁ cīvaraṁ pariyesitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.2: Sace acchinnakeso āgacchati, saṅgho apaloketabbo bhaṇḍukammāya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.3: Ye te, bhikkhave, aggikā jaṭilakā, te āgatā upasampādetabbā, na tesaṁ parivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.6: Sace, bhikkhave, jātiyā sākiyo aññatitthiyapubbo āgacchati, so āgato upasampādetabbo, na tassa parivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.7: Imāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ñātīnaṁ āveṇikaṁ parihāraṁ dammī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena magadhesu pañca ābādhā ussannā honti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.3: Manussā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhā jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.6: rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṅgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.1: “Ahaṁ khvayyo, bahukicco bahukaraṇīyo rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṅgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.4: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā, subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.6: Tattha bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahissanti, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.7: Atha kho te manussā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāciṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.9: Te bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahiṁsu jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bahū gilāne bhikkhū upaṭṭhahantā yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharanti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.3.3: Jīvakopi komārabhacco bahū gilāne bhikkhū tikicchanto aññataraṁ rājakiccaṁ parihāpesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.1: Aññataropi puriso pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.3: “Ahaṁ khvayyo, bahukicco, bahukaraṇīyo, rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṅgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.5: “Sabbaṁ sāpateyyañca te, ācariya, hotu, ahañca te dāso;
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.7: “Ahaṁ khvayyo, bahukicco bahukaraṇīyo, rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṅgho, nāhaṁ sakkomi tikicchitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.2: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā, subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.4: Tattha bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahissanti, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchissati.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.6: Atha kho so puriso bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.8: Taṁ bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahiṁsu, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.10: Addasā kho jīvako komārabhacco taṁ purisaṁ vibbhantaṁ, disvāna taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.14: Atha kho so puriso jīvakassa komārabhaccassa etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.2: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.3: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.4: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.5: “sādhu, bhante, ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.1: Atha kho bhagavā jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.2: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccanto kupito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.2: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro senānāyake mahāmatte āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.4: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho senānāyakā mahāmattā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccassosuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.1: Atha kho abhiññātānaṁ abhiññātānaṁ yodhānaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.2: “mayaṁ kho yuddhābhinandino gacchantā pāpañca karoma, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavāma.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.3: Kena nu kho mayaṁ upāyena pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāmā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.5: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.6: Sace kho mayaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyāma, evaṁ mayaṁ pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.7: Atha kho te yodhā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāciṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.2: “kiṁ nu kho, bhaṇe, itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca yodhā na dissantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.3: “Itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca, sāmi, yodhā bhikkhūsu pabbajitā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.6: Senānāyakā mahāmattā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.7: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vohārike mahāmatte pucchi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.8: “yo, bhaṇe, rājabhaṭaṁ pabbājeti, kiṁ so pasavatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.9: “Upajjhāyassa, deva, sīsaṁ chetabbaṁ, anussāvakassa jivhā uddharitabbā, gaṇassa upaḍḍhaphāsukā bhañjitabbā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.5: Sādhu, bhante, ayyā rājabhaṭaṁ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.6: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.7: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.8: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena coro aṅgulimālo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.2: Manussā passitvā ubbijjantipi, uttasantipi, palāyantipi, aññenapi gacchanti, aññenapi mukhaṁ karonti, dvārampi thakenti.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhajabandhaṁ coraṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.5: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena anuññātaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.2: “ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṁ;
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.3: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso corikaṁ katvā kārāya baddho hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.5: So kāraṁ bhinditvā palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.7: ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṁ;
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.8: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.10: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.11: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā kārabhedakaṁ coraṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso corikaṁ katvā palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.2: So ca rañño antepure likhito hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.9: Anuññātaṁ raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṁ, svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.11: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.12: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā likhitakaṁ coraṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:44.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso kasāhato katadaṇḍakammo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:44.1.3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā kasāhataṁ katadaṇḍakammaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:45.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso lakkhaṇāhato katadaṇḍakammo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:45.1.3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā lakkhaṇāhataṁ katadaṇḍakammaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso iṇāyiko palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.8: ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṁ;
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.9: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.13: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā iṇāyikaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro dāso palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.6: “māyyo, evaṁ avacuttha, anuññātaṁ raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṁ, svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.8: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.9: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dāsaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro kammārabhaṇḍu mātāpitūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.1.2: Atha kho tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitaro taṁ kammārabhaṇḍuṁ vicinantā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhū pucchiṁsu—
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.1: Atha kho tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitaro taṁ kammārabhaṇḍuṁ vicinantā bhikkhūsu pabbajitaṁ disvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.3: Jānaṁyeva āhaṁsu—‘na jānāmā’ti, passaṁyeva āhaṁsu—‘na passāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.5: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitūnaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe sattarasavaggiyā dārakā sahāyakā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.4: “kena nu kho upāyena upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.6: “sace kho upāli lekhaṁ sikkheyya, evaṁ kho upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.8: “sace kho upāli lekhaṁ sikkhissati, aṅguliyo dukkhā bhavissanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.9: Sace kho upāli gaṇanaṁ sikkheyya, evaṁ kho upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.1: “sace kho upāli gaṇanaṁ sikkhissati, urassa dukkho bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.2: Sace kho upāli rūpaṁ sikkheyya, evaṁ kho upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.4: “sace kho upāli rūpaṁ sikkhissati, akkhīni dukkhā bhavissanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.5: Ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā, subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.6: Sace kho upāli samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya, evaṁ kho upāli amhākaṁ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.1: Assosi kho upālidārako mātāpitūnaṁ imaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.2: Atha kho upālidārako yena te dārakā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te dārake etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.4: “Sace kho tvaṁ, ayya, pabbajissasi, evaṁ mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.5: Atha kho te dārakā ekamekassa mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd1:49.4.5: Sace yāgu bhavissati pivissatha, sace bhattaṁ bhavissati bhuñjissatha, sace khādanīyaṁ bhavissati khādissatha;
pli-tv-kd1:49.4.6: no ce bhavissati yāgu vā bhattaṁ vā khādanīyaṁ vā, piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjissathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.4.7: Evampi kho te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā rodantiyeva “yāguṁ detha, bhattaṁ detha, khādanīyaṁ dethā”ti;
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.1: Assosi kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya dārakasaddaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.4: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.5: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū jānaṁ ūnavīsativassaṁ puggalaṁ upasampādentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.8: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā jānaṁ ūnavīsativassaṁ puggalaṁ upasampādessanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.1: Ūnavīsativasso, bhikkhave, puggalo akkhamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ anadhivāsakajātiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.2: Vīsativassova kho, bhikkhave, puggalo khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ, uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.3: Netaṁ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya, pasannānaṁ vā bhiyyobhāvāya …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataraṁ kulaṁ ahivātakarogena kālaṅkataṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.3: Te bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā ekatova piṇḍāya caranti.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.4: Atha kho so dārako pituno bhikkhāya dinnāya upadhāvitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.10: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.11: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato ānandassa upaṭṭhākakulaṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ ahivātakarogena kālaṅkataṁ hoti, dve ca dārakā sesā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.2: Te porāṇakena āciṇṇakappena bhikkhū passitvā upadhāvanti.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.9: Kena nu kho upāyena ime dārakā na vinasseyyun”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.10: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.11: “Ussahanti pana te, ānanda, dārakā kāke uḍḍāpetun”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:52.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa dve sāmaṇerā honti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tattheva rājagahe vassaṁ vasi, tattha hemantaṁ, tattha gimhaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.3: “āhundarikā samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtiyānaṁ disā andhakārā, na imesaṁ disā pakkhāyantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.4: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.2.5: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā avāpuraṇaṁ ādāya anupariveṇiyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ārocesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.2: “bhagavatā, āvuso ānanda, paññattaṁ dasavassāni nissāya vatthuṁ, dasavassena nissayaṁ dātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.3: Tattha ca no gantabbaṁ bhavissati, nissayo ca gahetabbo bhavissati, ittaro ca vāso bhavissati, puna ca paccāgantabbaṁ bhavissati, puna ca nissayo gahetabbo bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.4: Sace amhākaṁ ācariyupajjhāyā gamissanti, mayampi gamissāma;
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.5: no ce amhākaṁ ācariyupajjhāyā gamissanti, mayampi na gamissāma.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā ogaṇena bhikkhusaṅghena dakkhiṇāgiriṁ cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā punadeva rājagahaṁ paccāgacchi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.3: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.4: “kiṁ nu kho, ānanda, tathāgato ogaṇena bhikkhusaṅghena dakkhiṇāgiriṁ cārikaṁ pakkanto”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.5: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.7: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena pañcavassāni nissāya vatthuṁ, abyattena yāvajīvaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.2: Na asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti na asekkhena samādhikkhandhena, na asekkhena paññākkhandhena na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena na asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.4: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.5: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti asekkhena samādhikkhandhena.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.9: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.1: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.2: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.4: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.5: Saddho hoti, hirimā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, upaṭṭhitassati hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.1: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.2: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti, appassuto hoti, duppañño hoti—

pli-tv-kd1:53.7.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.

pli-tv-kd1:53.13.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.4: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.5: Āpattiṁ jānāti, anāpattiṁ jānāti, lahukaṁ āpattiṁ jānāti, garukaṁ āpattiṁ jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, pañcavasso vā hoti atirekapañcavasso vā—
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabban”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena kapilavatthu tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena kapilavatthu tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.3: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.4: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena suddhodanassa sakkassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.5: Atha kho rāhulamātā devī rāhulaṁ kumāraṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.1: Atha kho rāhulo kumāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato purato, aṭṭhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.4: Atha kho rāhulo kumāro bhagavantaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.7: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.8: “tena hi tvaṁ, sāriputta, rāhulaṁ kumāraṁ pabbājehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.4: paṭhamaṁ kesamassuṁ ohārāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā ‘evaṁ vadehī’ti vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.14: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇerapabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto rāhulaṁ kumāraṁ pabbājesi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.2: Atha kho suddhodano sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.3: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho suddhodano sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:54.5.1: “Bhagavati me, bhante, pabbajite anappakaṁ dukkhaṁ ahosi, tathā nande, adhimattaṁ rāhule.
pli-tv-kd1:54.5.2: Puttapemaṁ, bhante, chaviṁ chindati, chaviṁ chetvā cammaṁ chindati, cammaṁ chetvā maṁsaṁ chindati, maṁsaṁ chetvā nhāruṁ chindati, nhāruṁ chetvā aṭṭhiṁ chindati, aṭṭhiṁ chetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṁ āhacca tiṭṭhati.
pli-tv-kd1:54.5.3: Sādhu, bhante, ayyā ananuññātaṁ mātāpitūhi puttaṁ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā suddhodanaṁ sakkaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.2: Atha kho suddhodano sakko bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā kapilavatthusmiṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.3: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa santike dārakaṁ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.12: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena ekena dve sāmaṇere upaṭṭhāpetuṁ, yāvatake vā pana ussahati ovadituṁ anusāsituṁ tāvatake upaṭṭhāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.2: “kati nu kho amhākaṁ sikkhāpadāni, kattha ca amhehi sikkhitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṁ dasa sikkhāpadāni, tesu ca sāmaṇerehi sikkhituṁ—
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.15: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṁ imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni, imesu ca sāmaṇerehi sikkhitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāmaṇerā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharanti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.3: “kathañhi nāma sāmaṇerā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.5: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammaṁ kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.11: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammaṁ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṁ sabbaṁ saṅghārāmaṁ āvaraṇaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.6: Sāmaṇerā ārāmaṁ pavisituṁ alabhamānā pakkamantipi, vibbhamantipi, titthiyesupi saṅkamanti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.10: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yattha vā vasati, yattha vā paṭikkamati, tattha āvaraṇaṁ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṁ mukhadvārikaṁ āhāraṁ āvaraṇaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.2: Manussā yāgupānampi saṅghabhattampi karontā sāmaṇere evaṁ vadenti—
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.9: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā sāmaṇerānaṁ mukhadvārikaṁ āhāraṁ āvaraṇaṁ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū upajjhāye anāpucchā sāmaṇerānaṁ āvaraṇaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.3: “kathaṁ nu kho amhākaṁ sāmaṇerā na dissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū amhe anāpucchā amhākaṁ sāmaṇerānaṁ āvaraṇaṁ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:59.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sāmaṇere apalāḷenti.
pli-tv-kd1:59.1.2: Therā sāmaṁ dantakaṭṭhampi mukhodakampi gaṇhantā kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd1:60.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa kaṇṭako nāma sāmaṇero kaṇṭakiṁ nāma bhikkhuniṁ dūsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:60.1.16: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṁ sāmaṇeraṁ nāsetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro paṇḍako bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.2: So dahare dahare bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.5: “nassa, paṇḍaka, vinassa, paṇḍaka, ko tayā attho”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.6: So bhikkhūhi apasādito mahante mahante moḷigalle sāmaṇere upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.9: “nassa, paṇḍaka, vinassa, paṇḍaka, ko tayā attho”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.10: So sāmaṇerehi apasādito hatthibhaṇḍe assabhaṇḍe upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.15: Yepi imesaṁ na paṇḍakā, tepi ime paṇḍake dūsenti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.17: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ hatthibhaṇḍānaṁ assabhaṇḍānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.18: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.19: “Paṇḍako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño sukhumālo hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.2: Atha kho tassa purāṇakulaputtassa khīṇakolaññassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.3: “ahaṁ kho sukhumālo, na paṭibalo anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigantuṁ, adhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.4: Kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena sukhañca jīveyyaṁ, na ca kilameyyan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.5: Atha kho tassa purāṇakulaputtassa khīṇakolaññassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.6: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā, subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.7: Yannūnāhaṁ sāmaṁ pattacīvaraṁ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvaseyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.2.1: Atha kho so purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño sāmaṁ pattacīvaraṁ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhū abhivādeti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.1: Atha kho so purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.4: “Theyyasaṁvāsako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.5: Titthiyapakkantako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro nāgo nāgayoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.3: “kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena nāgayoniyā ca parimucceyyaṁ khippañca manussattaṁ paṭilabheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.5: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.6: Sace kho ahaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṁ, evāhaṁ nāgayoniyā ca parimucceyyaṁ, khippañca manussattaṁ paṭilabheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.1: Atha kho so nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.3: Tena kho pana samayena so nāgo aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ paccantime vihāre paṭivasati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.4: Atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.5: Atha kho so nāgo tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭho niddaṁ okkami.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.6: Sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṁ pavisissāmīti kavāṭaṁ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṁ vihāraṁ ahinā puṇṇaṁ, vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante, disvāna bhīto vissaramakāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.4: “Ayaṁ, āvuso, sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.5: Atha kho so nāgo tena saddena paṭibujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.10: Atha kho so nāgo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā taṁ nāgaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.3: Gaccha tvaṁ, nāga, tattheva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposathaṁ upavasa, evaṁ tvaṁ nāgayoniyā ca parimuccissasi, khippañca manussattaṁ paṭilabhissasī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.4: Atha kho so nāgo aviruḷhidhammo kirāhaṁ imasmiṁ dhammavinayeti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno vissaraṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.3: Yadā ca sajātiyā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, yadā ca vissaṭṭho niddaṁ okkamati—
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya.
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.5: Tiracchānagato, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro māṇavako mātaraṁ jīvitā voropesi.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.2: So tena pāpakena kammena aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.4: “kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṁ kareyyan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.6: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.7: Sace kho ahaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṁ, evāhaṁ imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṁ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.1: Atha kho so māṇavako bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.3: “pubbepi kho, āvuso upāli, nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhūsu pabbajito.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.5: Atha kho so māṇavako āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.8: “mātughātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro māṇavako pitaraṁ jīvitā voropesi.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.2: So tena pāpakena kammena aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.4: “kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṁ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.6: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā, sace kho ahaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṁ, evāhaṁ imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṁ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.7: Atha kho so māṇavako bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.9: “pubbepi kho, āvuso upāli, nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhūsu pabbajito.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.11: Atha kho so māṇavako āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.14: “Pitughātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū sāketā sāvatthiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.2: Antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā ekacce bhikkhū acchindiṁsu, ekacce bhikkhū haniṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.3: Sāvatthiyā rājabhaṭā nikkhamitvā ekacce core aggahesuṁ, ekacce corā palāyiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.4: Ye te palāyiṁsu te bhikkhūsu pabbajiṁsu, ye te gahitā te vadhāya oniyyanti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.1: Addasaṁsu kho te palāyitvā pabbajitā te core vadhāya oniyyamāne, disvāna evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.2: “sādhu kho mayaṁ palāyimhā, sacā ca mayaṁ gayheyyāma, mayampi evameva haññeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.5: Atha kho te pabbajitā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.8: Arahantaghātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo sāketā sāvatthiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.2: Antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā ekaccā bhikkhuniyo acchindiṁsu, ekaccā bhikkhuniyo dūsesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.3: Sāvatthiyā rājabhaṭā nikkhamitvā ekacce core aggahesuṁ, ekacce corā palāyiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.4: Ye te palāyiṁsu, te bhikkhūsu pabbajiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.5: Ye te gahitā, te vadhāya oniyyanti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.6: Addasaṁsu kho te palāyitvā pabbajitā te core vadhāya oniyyamāne, disvāna evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.7: “sādhu kho mayaṁ palāyimhā, sacā ca mayaṁ gayheyyāma, mayampi evameva haññeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.10: Atha kho te pabbajitā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.12: “Bhikkhunidūsako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.13: Saṅghabhedako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.14: Lohituppādako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:68.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro ubhatobyañjanako bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:68.1.4: “Ubhatobyañjanako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anupajjhāyakaṁ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saṅghena upajjhāyena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gaṇena upajjhāyena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paṇḍakupajjhāyena upasampādenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:70.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū apattakaṁ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū acīvarakaṁ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū apattacīvarakaṁ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena pattena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena cīvarena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena pattacīvarena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:71.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū hatthacchinnaṁ pabbājenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū alajjīnaṁ nissayaṁ denti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū alajjīnaṁ nissāya vasanti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.12: ‘na alajjīnaṁ nissayo dātabbo, na alajjīnaṁ nissāya vatthabban’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.13: Kathaṁ nu kho mayaṁ jāneyyāma lajjiṁ vā alajjiṁ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.15: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catūhapañcāhaṁ āgametuṁ yāva bhikkhusabhāgataṁ jānāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.5: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo addhānamaggappaṭipanno, kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.7: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, addhānamaggappaṭipannena bhikkhunā nissayaṁ alabhamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū kosalesu janapade addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.4: Atha kho tassa gilānassa bhikkhuno etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.7: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo gilāno, kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.9: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā nissayaṁ alabhamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.1: Atha kho tassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa bhikkhuno etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.4: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo, ayañca bhikkhu gilāno, kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.6: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānupaṭṭhākena bhikkhunā nissayaṁ alabhamānena yāciyamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu araññe viharati.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.2: Tassa ca tasmiṁ senāsane phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.6: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo araññe viharāmi, mayhañca imasmiṁ senāsane phāsu hoti, kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āraññikena bhikkhunā phāsuvihāraṁ sallakkhentena nissayaṁ alabhamānena anissitena vatthuṁ—
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.9: yadā patirūpo nissayadāyako āgacchissati, tadā tassa nissāya vasissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato mahākassapassa upasampadāpekkho hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmato ānandassa santike dūtaṁ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.5: “nāhaṁ ussahāmi therassa nāmaṁ gahetuṁ, garu me thero”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato mahākassapassa dve upasampadāpekkhā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulānaṁ therānaṁ upasampadāpekkhā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.3.7: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve tayo ekānussāvane kātuṁ, tañca kho ekena upajjhāyena, na tveva nānupajjhāyenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:75.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo gabbhavīso upasampanno ahosi.
pli-tv-kd1:75.1.6: Upasampanno nu khomhi, nanu kho upasampanno”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:75.1.8: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, mātukucchismiṁ paṭhamaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ, paṭhamaṁ viññāṇaṁ pātubhūtaṁ, tadupādāya sāvassa jāti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena upasampannā dissanti kuṭṭhikāpi gaṇḍikāpi kilāsikāpi sosikāpi apamārikāpi.
pli-tv-kd1:76.1.3: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, upasampādentena terasa antarāyike dhamme pucchituṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ananusiṭṭhe upasampadāpekkhe antarāyike dhamme pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.2: Upasampadāpekkhā vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṁ anusāsitvā pacchā antarāyike dhamme pucchitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.2: Upasampadāpekkhā tatheva vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekamantaṁ anusāsitvā saṅghamajjhe antarāyike dhamme pucchituṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.8: ‘ayaṁ te patto, ayaṁ saṅghāṭi, ayaṁ uttarāsaṅgo, ayaṁ antaravāsako.
pli-tv-kd1:76.4.2: Duranusiṭṭhā upasampadāpekkhā vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.4.6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena anusāsitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.5.7: attanā vā attānaṁ sammannitabbaṁ, parena vā paro sammannitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:76.5.12: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ itthannāmaṁ anusāseyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.6.5: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṁ anusāseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.1: Tena sammatena bhikkhunā upasampadāpekkho upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.3: Yaṁ jātaṁ taṁ saṅghamajjhe pucchante santaṁ atthīti vattabbaṁ, asantaṁ natthīti vattabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.4: Mā kho vitthāyi, mā kho maṅku ahosi.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.9: Ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā upasampadaṁ yācāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.11: Ullumpatu maṁ, bhante, saṅgho anukampaṁ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.13: Ullumpatu maṁ, bhante, saṅgho anukampaṁ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.15: Ullumpatu maṁ, bhante, saṅgho anukampaṁ upādāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.4: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ itthannāmaṁ antarāyike dhamme puccheyyanti?
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.5: Suṇasi, itthannāma, ayaṁ te saccakālo bhūtakālo.
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.7: Santaṁ atthīti vattabbaṁ, asantaṁ natthīti vattabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.10.3: Ayaṁ itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehi, paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaraṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.10.4: Itthannāmo saṅghaṁ upasampadaṁ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.10.5: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ upasampādeyya itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.11.2: Ayaṁ itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehi, paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaraṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.11.3: Itthannāmo saṅghaṁ upasampadaṁ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.11.5: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.3: Ayaṁ itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehi, paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaraṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.4: Itthannāmo saṅghaṁ upasampadaṁ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.6: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.10: Ayaṁ itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehi, paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaraṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.11: Itthannāmo saṅghaṁ upasampadaṁ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.13: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.16: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:77.1.1: “Tāvadeva chāyā metabbā, utuppamāṇaṁ ācikkhitabbaṁ, divasabhāgo ācikkhitabbo, saṅgīti ācikkhitabbā, cattāro nissayā ācikkhitabbā—
pli-tv-kd1:77.1.5: saṅghabhattaṁ, uddesabhattaṁ, nimantanaṁ, salākabhattaṁ, pakkhikaṁ, uposathikaṁ, pāṭipadikaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:77.1.9: khomaṁ, kappāsikaṁ, koseyyaṁ, kambalaṁ, sāṇaṁ, bhaṅgaṁ.
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ upasampādetvā ekakaṁ ohāya pakkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.2: So pacchā ekakova āgacchanto antarāmagge purāṇadutiyikāya samāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.8: So tassā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevitvā cirena agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.3: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, upasampādetvā dutiyaṁ dātuṁ, cattāri ca akaraṇīyāni ācikkhituṁ—
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.4: Upasampannena bhikkhunā methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo, antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.5: Yo bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.6: Seyyathāpi nāma puriso sīsacchinno abhabbo tena sarīrabandhanena jīvituṁ;
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.7: evameva bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.1: Upasampannena bhikkhunā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ na ādātabbaṁ, antamaso tiṇasalākaṁ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.2: Yo bhikkhu pādaṁ vā pādārahaṁ vā atirekapādaṁ vā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.3: Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāya;
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.4: evameva bhikkhu pādaṁ vā pādārahaṁ vā atirekapādaṁ vā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.1: Upasampannena bhikkhunā sañcicca pāṇo jīvitā na voropetabbo, antamaso kunthakipillikaṁ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.2: Yo bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropeti, antamaso gabbhapātanaṁ upādāya, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.3: Seyyathāpi nāma puthusilā dvedhā bhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti;
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.4: evameva bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropetvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.1: Upasampannena bhikkhunā uttarimanussadhammo na ullapitabbo, antamaso ‘suññāgāre abhiramāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.2: Yo bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati jhānaṁ vā vimokkhaṁ vā samādhiṁ vā samāpattiṁ vā maggaṁ vā phalaṁ vā, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.3: Seyyathāpi nāma tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viruḷhiyā;
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.4: evameva bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako vibbhami.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.4: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.5: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.2.8: No ce passati, labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.18: No ce paṭikaroti labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.18: No ce paṭinissajjati, labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.80: Yo so añño ca naggo ca,
